column4: Is there a fix to the problem with IDE disks getting recognized as SCSI disks and thus won't work with hdparm?
They should still work with hdparm.  The move from hda to sda is intentional.
I get "Inappropriate ioctl for device" when trying to set 32 bit io flag and dma flag on the disk.
If you don't mind, file a bug on launchpad.  Since, that obviously should work.
